Class AutoPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player
      • AutoPlayer

  • public class AutoPlayer
extends Player
    An automatic player for our card game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AutoPlayer(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new player with a given name, no cards in hand, no cards collected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Card next()
      Returns the next card to play (no input, meant to be used if this player is the first one to play in this round).
      Precondition: There is at least one card in this player's hand.
      Card next(Card card)
      Returns the next card to play (meant to be used if this player is the second one to play in this round).
      Precondition: There is at least one card in this player's hand.

      • Methods inherited from class Player

        addToCollectedCards, addToHand, cardsInHand, collectedCards, hand, name, removeFromHand

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutoPlayer

        public AutoPlayer(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a new player with a given name, no cards in hand, no cards collected.
        Parameters:
        name - the player's name

    • Method Detail

      • next

        public Card next()
        Returns the next card to play (no input, meant to be used if this player is the first one to play in this round).
        Precondition: There is at least one card in this player's hand.
        Returns:
        a card in this player's hand

      • next

        public Card next(Card card)
        Returns the next card to play (meant to be used if this player is the second one to play in this round).
        Precondition: There is at least one card in this player's hand.
        Parameters:
        card - the card played by the opponent
        Returns:
        a card in this player's hand
